name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
本課程通過學習有關重大文化主題的常識性文本，幫助學生發展基本的英語閱讀和會話技巧。
This course helps students develop basic English language reading and conversation skills through study of general knowledge texts about significant cultural topics.
